actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code relating to condominium and cooperative home loans.

summary.text: Permits the Veterans' Administration to guarantee home mortgages for the purchase of homes or apartments converted to condominiums or cooperatives by removing the current restriction on such loans to new condominium housing developments, projects, or structures.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code relating to condominium and cooperative home loans.
